content: I'm glad you mentioned that about reading reviews and doing a patch test. I've had some bad reactions to products in the past, so I always make sure to do my research. Speaking of research, I've been wanting to try out some new thrift stores in my area. I recently discovered this amazing spot called "The Vintage Spot" and I've been obsessed. Have you heard of it or do you have any recommendations for other thrift stores in my area?
